    • Method Detail

      • getSession

        List<com.nimbits.client.model.user.User> getSession(List<org.apache.http.message.BasicNameValuePair> params)
        Returns the authenticated user for that session. Response is a JSON formated User object in a list.
        Parameters:
        params - required authentication params with at least an email, user access key or server api key key=some key email=user's email
        Returns:
        A list with a valid user or an empty list if authentication fails.
        See Also:
        User
